body_html:
Thank you . I seem to have resolved the issue as on the command line i tested the tensoflow with Hello world and worked so happy until i realsied that tensoflow 1.8 was running on cpu and no gpu . then i did the following :from tensorflow.python.client import device_lib followed by print(device_lib.list_local_devices()): "/device:CPU:0"
device_type: "CPU"
memory_limit: 268435456
locality {
}
incarnation: 14605564845436371737
How do I get GPU working and how come it is not ? Am I missing some installation ?
